author: Theophilus
text: I’m giving all these ANC patients 2/52 appointment with joy & gladness in my heart knowing fully well that they won’t be seeing me here by their next visit 🥳

author: Theophilus
text:
The first time I’ll bring home-cooked meal to this office is when this patient na choose to vomit here🙄

Yuck 🤢 
#trenches
#NYSCJournal

author: Theophilus
text:
I can’t remember Arsenal winning any game lokonga has started.

I stand to be corrected.

Why he might not seem much of a problem, he certainly can’t dictate a game/midfield like partey can.

An upgrade is definitely needed.

author: Theophilus
text:
They were doing some repair works in his consulting room.

Also, he had gone for CDS while i stayed put to cover for him & within that short period i attended to multiple emergencies

I was happy for him to still get small work & ‘HMO’ people came with it🤣
#NYSCjournals

author: Theophilus
text:
Mood after arranging the patients in the consulting room for my colleague to see.

“Woman walks into the consulting room with 5 children..🤣

Dr:How many of you am i seeing ?😳

Mother:All of us 😏

Dr:😩

Me:🤣🤣dutifully arranging the children in the chairs & excusing dem https://t.co/MwQyKGJY27

author: Theophilus
text:
Benzema has gotta be up there among the best to have ever laced a boot

Man is aging so gracefully(on the pitch)

Then, on the other hand, my #9 has 4 goals all season😭
#Lacazette #Benzema #UCL

author: Theophilus
text: Fame go sweet o. You go just dey notifications wey no be alert 🌚 https://t.co/6pdrGeEnSN

author: Theophilus
text:
I await the good news✊🏽
I’ll update it on here

author: Theophilus
text:
We referred because the twins would most likely need incubator care,etc

Though fetal lung maturity usually occurs around 34 weeks + we’v given her steroid previously to aid the lung maturity &  boost their survival chances incase of an Emergency C/S

author: Theophilus
text: We can actually predict the child’s sex via their FHR. Based on this, she’ll be having both girls 🤞🏽 https://t.co/trctuc0zJj

author: Theophilus
text:
PS: we’re yet to pick up their sexes via USS
So i told maybe they’re both boys, hence why they kicked & ruptured her membrane 😬
She said ‘Dr it’s not funny’. Though thanked me afterwards 

Eventually, The consultant came, reviewed & we referred her to a tertiary centre

...

author: Theophilus
text:
It takes a lot for a matured man to cry, that must mean a whole lot to him

I eventually went to stay beside the wife, even way past my shift period

Reassuring her, monitoring the twins, Etc 
Even made some jokes🤭

author: Theophilus
text:
We started doing serial monitoring all through the night
(FHR, which remained great ; Maternal temperature, Etc pending daylight when the consultant could come do a scan & assess her

The husband came to office with tears in his eyes saying ‘I don’t want to lose my twins’

Omooo

author: Theophilus
text:
Early hours of this morning, she had what we call PPROM( PretermPremature Rupture of membrane) & it was quite a lot of liquor, Alongside serious preterm contractions 
& was rushed to the hospital 

NB: she’s currently 34/52 4 days

author: Theophilus
text:
(There are other drs in the hospital + the MD, a consultant O&G)

Her husband always comes along with her for her ANC visits & we’l discuss certain things regarding her condition, laugh, Etc 

He’s a lecturer so he’s quite knowledgeable about different things

So,...

author: Theophilus
text:
Today , i saw a matured man cry and i was deeply moved 

He cried because he thought his wife was going to loss her twin gestation pregnancy 

I’v mostly been the person attending to her all through her ANC (Based on their preference)
#NYSCJournal

author: Theophilus
text:
As i enter the final weeks of my service year,  i’ll be documenting some noteworthy encounters/experiences on here
#NYSCjournal

author: Theophilus
text:
I probably should have done this earlier but i just paid for a digital one now for my Dad 😇

The plan is for him to be checking his Bp dly & giving me feedback while still on meds

The complications of elevated Bp are grave,literally!

Let’s do utmost best to prevent what we can https://t.co/p4v5SQ6L6X

author: Theophilus
text:
Arsenal have now collected 4 red cards this season . 2 against Liverpool & 2 against Man city

It’s almost like we do too much when we play against these guys forgetting that these actions affect subsequent games

Discipline & Consistency is so integral to a successful season rn
